mapper.select: select DISTINCT sys_user_id from device WHERE sys_user_id IS NOT NULL and is_deleted=0 and status !=6
select DISTINCT owner_id from device WHERE owner_id IS NOT NULL and is_deleted =0 and status !=6
select distinct d.`product_id` from device d WHERE d.owner_id = #{sysUserId} AND d.product_id IS NOT NULL and d.is_deleted=0 and d.status !=6
select distinct d.`product_id`as productId,p.`gizwits_product_key` as productKey from device d,product p where d.`product_id` = p.`id` AND d.product_id IS NOT NULL and d.is_deleted=0 and d.status !=6
SELECT d.* FROM device d,product p WHERE d.product_id=p.id AND d.mac=#{mac,jdbcType=VARCHAR } AND p.gizwits_product_key=#{productKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR } and p.is_deleted=0 and d.is_deleted=0
mapper.update: UPDATE device SET activate_status = 2, activated_time = #{time} WHERE sno = #{sno} AND activate_status = 1
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT count( d.sno ) AS total FROM device d WHERE d.is_deleted = 0 AND d.product_id = #{productId} ) AS total JOIN ( SELECT count( d1.sno ) AS addCount FROM device d1 WHERE d1.is_deleted = 0 AND d1.product_id = #{productId} AND date_format( d1.ctime, '%Y-%m-%d' ) = date_format(#{date}, '%Y-%m-%d' ) ) AS today JOIN ( SELECT count( d2.sno ) AS activeCount FROM device d2 WHERE d2.is_deleted = 0 AND d2.product_id = #{productId} AND d2.online_status = 1 AND d2.work_status = 3 ) AS active JOIN ( SELECT count( d3.sno ) AS faultCount FROM device d3 WHERE d3.is_deleted = 0 AND d3.product_id = #{productId} AND d3.work_status = 6 ) AS fault JOIN ( SELECT count( d4.sno ) AS alarmCount FROM device d4 WHERE d4.is_deleted = 0 AND d4.product_id = #{productId} AND d4.work_status = 8 ) AS alarm
